key.name: ac
key.description: Select the default profile to use when connected to AC

key.name: bat
key.description: Select the default profile to use when running on battery

key.name: remember-user-profile
key.description: When enabled, manually selected profiles become the new default for the current power state (AC/battery). When disabled, manual changes are temporary and the extension will revert to configured defaults on the next power state change.

key.name: performance-apps
key.summary: List of application IDs that should enable performance mode
key.description: This is a list of desktop application IDs. When any of these applications are running, performance mode will be enabled.

key.name: performance-apps-bat
key.summary: Profile to use for performance apps on battery
key.description: The power profile to enter when launching a performance app while on battery.

key.name: performance-apps-ac
key.summary: Profile to use for performance apps on AC
key.description: The power profile to enter when launching a performance app while on AC power.
